CustomField.description: Any number/type of descriptors can go here, for example: 'The agreement hard copy was sent (date) FeDex (tracking # xxxxx) to Mexico for signature'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Any number/type of descriptors can go here, for example: 'The agreement hard copy was sent (date) FeDex (tracking # xxxxx) to Mexico for signature'
CustomField.label: Description
